name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It turns out that Zhuozhou is protected by...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens' illustration of the relationship between Zhuozhou and Xiong'an New Area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the early morning of August 2, the government sent people to secretly dig the west embankment of the Ibaraki Bridge. The villagers found and stopped them. The villagers and the police confronted each other for 7 minutes.
The villagers at the scene questioned 4 points:
1. Why did they dig the embankment of our village when there was a flood discharge area?
2. Since there was no official document, is it a crime for these people to dig the embankment privately?
3. There are still elderly people and children in the village. If we were not here to guard the embankment, the village would be gone now.
4. Since the people and the police are not in opposition, why did they bring so many police here? To help us protect the embankment?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, the villagers on the embankment clashed again with the police in the police car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/CtClnRDFG8

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, after the official media reported that "villagers refused to leave after being notified of flood discharge", people began to wonder whether Zhuozhou had actually notified them of the flood discharge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The contributor originally thought that there were too many posts and there was no need to take screenshots, but later he found that some of them disappeared while he was reading them, so he took some screenshots and spliced them together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, netizens posted the current situation of Zhuozhou, Hebei after the flood discharge. The water depth was eight or nine meters, and the deepest reached 12 meters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xiong'an's local WeChat account published a post confirming that floodwaters were released from various parts of Hebei to protect Xiong'an.
It also said that if there were no Party Central Committee and General Secretary, we might be the ones to leave our hometowns...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Secretary of the Hebei Provincial Party Committee said: We will resolutely serve as the "moat" of the capital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens found that this public account has disappeared. However, according to the search records, other public accounts reposted its articles a few days ago, indicating that it really exists. The public account may have disappeared because of this article.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of August 3, a section of highway in Harbin collapsed due to heavy rain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @laoyingdream Thanks

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"You don't deserve it"
On the afternoon of August 3, Hu Xijin published an article to refute the Hebei Provincial Party Committee Secretary's remarks that "Be the moat of Beijing".
He said that Beijingers have never asked Hebei to be our "moat".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, Hu Xijin revised the blog post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 3
When the flood in Hebei spread
Xinhua News Agency’s B station account wished the panda Yaya a happy birthday.

From July 31 to now, Xinhua News Agency has only published one content related to the flood on B station

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Beijing Red Cross Society issued a statement on accepting social donations. The result caused ridicule in the comment area. Some netizens joked: Beware of online telecommunications fraud

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen who has been paying attention to the situation in Zhuozhou said that the live broadcast of Zhuozhou on Douyin is currently being restricted. Only by changing the location to the local area can the real situation be seen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @xDaily and DM videos pls

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: About ten minutes ago, these two topics were banned by Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 2, Beijing.
Some netizens found that workers were installing barriers to prevent people from seeing the Xiaoqing River Bridge that was washed away by floods earlier.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On August 3, under a video of the Beijing Olympic Sports Center
Netizens across the country paid tribute to the people of Zhuozhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shangzhi City, Harbin, is currently suffering from severe disasters

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Wuchang City, Heilongjiang Province, is currently severely affected by the disaster, and the rice fields have turned into Heze.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @chngymng11 The video says Olympic Center, thanks for correcting me

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, cement suddenly fell on the west bridge tunnel of Tiebei 2nd Road in Jilin City, hitting passing vehicles. It is suspected that the cement piled on the bridge increased in weight due to continuous rain, causing partial collapse.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, many people at the scene have opened the baffles to observe the situation.
